messages.subject: Re: too much candy (WARNING!!!!  don't read if you're eating)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Nope, doesn t make you throw up if that s what you mean.  It s just an itty bitty sugar pill that, when placed under the tongue, will make the tummy start
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, SandraDodd@a... wrote:
>
> In a message dated 4/11/03 3:23:17 PM, starsuncloud@c... writes:
>
> << Have you tried Nux Vomica? Works like a charm on me. >>
>
> Does it look like "Chux Vomita" for a reason?


Nope, doesn't make you throw up if that's what you mean. It's just
an itty bitty sugar pill that, when placed under the tongue, will
make the tummy start to feel better.
Sheila

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] too much candy (WARNING!!!!  don't read if  you're eating)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Yuck Well, by the time I found the Nux Vom he felt OK and was eating an apple. He s got a tougher tummy than me :-) Shyrley [Non-text portions of this
messages.messageBody:
SandraDodd@... wrote:

> In a message dated 4/11/03 3:23:17 PM, starsuncloud@... writes:
>
> << Have you tried Nux Vomica? Works like a charm on me. >>
>
> Does it look like "Chux Vomita" for a reason?
>
> I stick my finger down my throat if I felt too sick.
> It's really cheap.
>
> Sandra
>

Yuck
Well, by the time I found the Nux Vom he felt OK and was eating an apple.
He's got a tougher tummy than me :-)

Shyrley

messages.subject: too much candy (WARNING!!!!  don't read if you're eating)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/11/03 3:23:17 PM, starsuncloud@cs.com writes:  Does it look like Chux Vomita
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/11/03 3:23:17 PM, starsuncloud@... writes:

<< Have you tried Nux Vomica? Works like a charm on me. >>

Does it look like "Chux Vomita" for a reason?

I stick my finger down my throat if I felt too sick.
It's really cheap.

Sandra
